title: Scenario:: Verify we can perform a Virtual Checkin into a game without selecting a location
custom_preconds:
Given that the user has not selected a location
And that the user is not near a stadium
custom_steps:
When the user taps the Checkin button
And the user doesn't select a Foursquare Login
And the user completes the Checkin process
custom_expected: Then the user is able to Checkin successfully

title: Scenario: Verify we can perform a Virtual Checkin into a game when location services are disabled on the device
custom_preconds:
Given we have disabled the location services on the device
And we have selected the More menu item
And we have selected the At the Ballpark menu item
And we have selected a Stadium
custom_steps: When we tap on the Checkin button
custom_expected: Then we are able to Checkin successfully

title: Scenario: Verify when we perform a successful Virtual Checkin that it is stored in the server as type virtual
custom_preconds:
Given we aren't near a Stadium
And we aren't near an MLB Sponsored Location
And we have selected the More menu item
And we have selected the At the Ballpark menu item
And we have selected a Stadium

NOTE: Please check with Mobile-QA to find out how to check if a Checkin has posted to the server correctly
custom_steps: When the user taps the Checkin button
custom_expected:
Then the user is able to Checkin successfully
And the Checkin stores on the server as type virtual

title: Scenario: Verify virtually checking in to twitter w/o location shows the proper tweet
custom_preconds:
Given the user is on a ballpark summary page
And there is a game scheduled for that day
And the checkin window is open
custom_steps:
When the user attempts to Checkin
And the user has enabled the Twitter switch
custom_expected:
Then the user is able to Checkin successfully
And the tweet will say:

"Watching the #team vs #team game w/ MLB.com"

title: Scenario: Verify when we perform a successful Virtual Checkin while the Facebook switch is enabled that it will post to Facebook as (name) checked in on Mlb.com Team vs. Team.  You can watch and listen LIVE with MLB.com
custom_preconds:
Given we aren't near a Stadium
And we aren't near an MLB Sponsored Location
And we have selected the More menu item
And we have selected the At the Ballpark menu item
And we have selected a Stadium
custom_steps:
When the user attempts to Checkin
And the user has enabled the Facebook switch
custom_expected:
Then the user is able to Checkin successfully
And the user is able to see the Checkin on Facebook in the format of (name) checked in on Mlb.com Team vs. Team.  You can watch and listen LIVE with MLB.com

title: Scenario: Verify that a user can perform a Virtual Checkin to the same game multiple times
custom_preconds:
Given we aren't near a Stadium
And we aren't near an MLB Sponsored Location
And we have selected the More menu item
And we have selected the At the Ballpark menu item
And we have selected a Stadium
custom_steps:
When the user taps the Checkin button
And the user completes the Checkin process successfully
And the user taps the Checkin button again
custom_expected: Then the user is able to Checkin multiple times to the same game

title: Scenario: Verify that if Offers are available for a Stadium and we perform a Virtual Checkin at that Stadium that the Offers do not unlock
custom_preconds:
Given we aren't near a Stadium
And we aren't near an MLB Sponsored Location
And we have selected the More menu item
And we have selected the At the Ballpark menu item
And we have selected a Stadium
And there are Offers available at this Stadium
And these Offers haven't been unlocked yet
custom_steps: When the user taps the Checkin button
custom_expected:
Then the user is able to Checkin successfully
And the Offers for the game / stadium in question aren't unlocked

title: Scenario: Verify if we aren't near a Stadium or an MLB Sponsored Location then the Foursquare Location will not be defaulted to anything
custom_preconds:
Given we aren't near a Stadium
And we aren't near an MLB Sponsored Location
And the user has launched at the ballpark
custom_steps:
When the user navigates to a stadium page
And taps the Checkin button
custom_expected: Then the user will be taken to the 'Location Error' screen

title: Scenario: Verify if we are near a Stadium or an MLB Sponsored Location and we tap on the Foursquare Location field that it brings up a list of Foursquare locations
custom_preconds:
Given we are near a Stadium 
or we aren't near an MLB Sponsored Location
And the user has launched At the Ballpark
custom_steps:
When the user navigates to a Stadium page
And taps the Checkin button
When the user taps the default location on the check in page
custom_expected: Then the user is taken to a page where a list of Foursquare Locations are displayed

title: Scenario: User selects a Foursquare Location from the Foursquare Location list
custom_preconds:
Given we are near a Stadium
Or we are near an MLB Sponsored Location
And the user has launched At the ballpark
custom_steps:
When the user navigates to a stadium page
And the user taps the Checkin button
And the user taps the default location
And the user chooses another foursquare location
custom_expected: Then the user is brought to the 'Checkin Disclaimer' screen.

title: Scenario: Verify if a Foursquare Location is selected that the user is able to click on that Foursquare Location to open up the Foursquare Location list again
custom_preconds:
Given we are near a Stadium
OR we are near an MLB Sponsored Location
custom_steps:
When the user navigates to a stadium page
And taps the check in button
And the user taps the default location
And the user selects a foursquare location
When the user taps the foursquare location
custom_expected: Then user will be brought to the Foursquare location list again.

title: Scenario: Verify that if the user clicks the Refresh button inside of the Foursquare Location list that it refreshes the list properly if the user has indeed moved to a different location
custom_preconds:
Given we aren near a Stadium
Or we are near an MLB Sponsored Location
custom_steps:
When the user navigates to a ballpark page
And the user taps the Checkin button
And the user taps the default location
And the user changes Locations
And the user taps the Find Me button
custom_expected:
Then the Foursquare Location list will update to display the new list of locations that are near the user
Note that the Stadium should remain at the top of the list.

title: Scenario: Verify if a Foursquare Location is selected and we perform a Checkin that the Checkin stores on the server as a type of foursquare
custom_preconds:
Given we are near a Stadium
And we are near an MLB Sponsored Location
And the user has launched At the Ballpark

NOTE:  Please check with Mobile-QA on how to check if a Checkin has properly stored on the server
custom_steps:
When the user Navigates to a Stadium page
And the user taps the Checkin button
And the user taps the default location
And the user chooses a foursquare location
And the user successfully checks in with a foursquare location
custom_expected:
Then the Checkin will be successful
And the Checkin will properly stored on the server as type foursquare

title: Scenario: Verify if a Foursquare Location is selected and we perform a Checkin with the Twitter switch enabled that the Twitter post will read correctly

Given we aren't near a Stadium
And we aren't near an MLB Sponsored Location
And we have selected the More menu item
And we have selected the At the Ballpark menu item
And we have selected a Stadium
custom_steps:
When the user taps the Checkin button
And the user taps the Foursquare Location field
And the user taps a Foursquare Location
And the user has enabled the Twitter switch
custom_expected:
Then the user is able to Checkin successfully
And the Twitter post reads as 'Checked in @ (foursquare location selected) for the #team vs #team game w/ MLB.com http://m.mlb.com/apps'

title: Scenario: Verify that a user can perform a Foursquare Checkin to the same game multiple times
custom_preconds:

And the user taps the Foursquare Location field
And the user taps a Foursquare Location
custom_expected:
Then the user is able to Checkin successfully
And the Offers aren't unlocked

custom_steps:

custom_expected: Then the check in will complete successfully

title: Scenario: Verify that if the device is near an MLB Sponsored location then the Foursquare location defaults to it when the user attempts to Checkin
custom_preconds:
Given we have utilizing the QA Location Override to set our device near an MLB Sponsored Location such as the MLB FanCave
And we have selected the More menu item
And we have selected the At the Ballpark menu item
And we have selected a Stadium

URL: https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/mobile/Stadium+Longitude-Latitude+from+Google+Maps,+Estimated+2nd+Base
custom_steps: When we tap on the Checkin button
custom_expected: Then the MLB Sponsored Location will be the defaulted Foursquare location

title: Scenario: Verify that if the device is near an MLB Sponsored location and the location has defaulted as the Foursquare location that the user is able to tap on the location and select a different Foursquare location to Checkin to
custom_preconds:
Given we have utilizing the QA Location Override to set our device near an MLB Sponsored Location such as the MLB FanCave
And we have selected the More menu item
And we have selected the At the Ballpark menu item
And we have selected a Stadium
And we have tapped on the Checkin button

URL: https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/mobile/Stadium+Longitude-Latitude+from+Google+Maps,+Estimated+2nd+Base
custom_steps: When we tap on the MLB Sponsored Location which has defaulted as the Foursquare Location
custom_expected:
Then we are able to select another Foursquare location
And we are able to Checkin successfully

title: Scenario: Verify that the user is able to successfully Checkin into an MLB Sponsored Location and that it stores on the server correctly as a type of mlb_sponsored
custom_preconds:
Given we have utilizing the QA Location Override to set our device near an MLB Sponsored Location such as the MLB FanCave
And we have selected the More menu item
And we have selected the At the Ballpark menu item
And we have selected a Stadium

URL: https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/mobile/Stadium+Longitude-Latitude+from+Google+Maps,+Estimated+2nd+Base
NOTE:  Check with QA on how to verify that a Checkin was properly stored on the server as mlb_sponsored
custom_steps: When we tap on the Checkin button
custom_expected:
Then the user is able to Checkin successfully
And the Checkin stores itself on the server as a type of mlb_sponsored

title: Scenario: Verify that the user is able to Checkin utilizing an MLB Sponsored Location and that they can do it when the Twitter, Facebook and Foursquare switches are enabled
custom_preconds:
Given we have utilizing the QA Location Override to set our device near an MLB Sponsored Location such as the MLB FanCave
And we have selected the More menu item
And we have selected the At the Ballpark menu item
And we have selected a Stadium

URL: https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/mobile/Stadium+Longitude-Latitude+from+Google+Maps,+Estimated+2nd+Base
custom_steps:
When the user attempts to Checkin
And the user has selected an MLB Sponsored Location as the Foursquare Location
And the user has enabled the Twitter switch
And the user has enabled the Facebook switch
And the user has enabled the Foursquare switch
custom_expected:
Then the user is able to Checkin successfully
And the Checkin posts to Twitter
And the Checkin posts to Facebook
And the Checkin posts to Foursquare

title: Scenario: Verify that if the user performs a Checkin at an MLB Sponsored Location when the Twitter, Facebook and Foursquare switches are enabled that the messages on each of the sites starts as Checked in @ MLB Sponsored Location
custom_preconds:
Given we have utilizing the QA Location Override to set our device near an MLB Sponsored Location such as the MLB FanCave
And we have selected the More menu item
And we have selected the At the Ballpark menu item
And we have selected a Stadium
custom_steps:
When the user attempts to Checkin
And the user has selected an MLB Sponsored Location as the Foursquare Location such as the MLB FanCave
And the user has enabled the Twitter switch
And the user has enabled the Facebook switch
And the user has enabled the Foursquare switch
custom_expected:
Then the user is able to Checkin successfully
And the Checkin posts to Twitter starting with Checked in @ MLB Sponsored Location Name
And the Checkin posts to Facebook starting with Checked in @ MLB Sponsored Location Name
And the Checkin posts to Foursquare starting with Checked in @ MLB Sponsored Location Name

title: Scenario: Verify if there are offers associated with an MLB Sponsored Location Checkin then that offer is unlocked when the user checks into an MLB Sponsored Location
custom_preconds:
Given we know there is an offer associated to an MLB Sponsored Location
And we have utilized the QA Location Override to set our device near an MLB Sponsored Location such as the MLB FanCave
And we have selected the More menu item
And we have selected the At the Ballpark menu item
And we have selected a Stadium
custom_steps: When the user attempts to Checkin
custom_expected:
Then they are able to Checkin successfully
And the offer that was associated to the MLB Sponsored Location has been unlocked

title: Scenario: Verify that if there is an offer associated to a Stadium and we attempt to check into that Stadium for a game not held at that Stadium then the offer is not unlocked
custom_preconds:
Given that there are Offers available at a particular Stadium
And we have utilized the QA Location Override to set our device near that particular Stadium
And we have selected the At the Ballpark menu item
And we have selected a different Stadium then what we set the QA Location Override to

URL: https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/mobile/Stadium+Longitude-Latitude+from+Google+Maps,+Estimated+2nd+Base
custom_steps:
When we tap on the Checkin button
And we then set the Foursquare Location to the Stadium that was set in the QA Location Override
custom_expected:
Then we are able to Checkin successfully
And the Offers for the first stadium are not unlocked

title: Scenario: Verify that the user is able to Checkin to an AdHoc Event and the Server stores the Checkin Type correctly: mlb, virtual, foursquare, mlb_sponsored + special_event = true
custom_preconds:
Given there is Developer assistance available
And the Developer has setup an AdHoc event

NOTE:  See Mobile-QA on how to check on what has been stored on the Server for Checkins
custom_expected:
Then the user is able to Checkin successfully
And the Checkin has stored correctly on the Server
And the Checkin stored on the server has the special_event flag set to True
